name: vscode-zig
description: Language support for the Zig programming language

zig.initialSetupDone.description: Has the initial setup been done yet?

zig.buildOnSave.description: Compiles code on file save using the settings specified in 'Build Option'.

zig.buildOption.description: Which build command Zig should use to build the code.

zig.buildArgs.description: Extra arguments to passed to Zig.

zig.buildFilePath.description: The path to build.zig. This is only required if zig.buildOptions = build.

zig.path.description: Set a custom path to the Zig binary. Empty string will lookup zig in PATH.

zig.checkForUpdate.description: Whether to automatically check for new updates

zig.revealOutputChannelOnFormattingError.description: Should output channel be raised on formatting error.

enumDescriptions: Use ZLS ast-check diagnostics (includes code actions)

zig.formattingProvider.description: Whether to enable formatting (requires restarting editor)
enumDescriptions: Use ZLS formatting (not recommended as zls's formatting is slower)

zig.zls.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

zig.zls.checkForUpdate.description: Whether to automatically check for new updates

zig.zls.enableSnippets.description: Enables snippet completions when the client also supports them

zig.zls.enableArgumentPlaceholders.description: Whether to enable function argument placeholder completions

zig.zls.enableAutofix.description: Whether to automatically fix errors on save. Currently supports adding and removing discards.

zig.zls.semanticTokens.description: Set level of semantic tokens. Partial only includes information that requires semantic analysis.

zig.zls.enableInlayHints.description: Enables inlay hint support when the client also supports it

zig.zls.inlayHintsShowVariableDeclaratio.description: Enable inlay hints for variable declarations

zig.zls.inlayHintsShowParameterName.description: Enable inlay hints for parameter names

zig.zls.inlayHintsShowBuiltin.description: Enable inlay hints for builtin functions

zig.zls.inlayHintsExcludeSingleArgument.description: Don't show inlay hints for single argument calls

zig.zls.inlayHintsHideRedundantParamName.description: Hides inlay hints when parameter name matches the identifier (e.g. foo: foo)
Hides inlay hints when parameter name matches the last token of a parameter node (e.g. foo: bar.foo, foo: &foo)

zig.zls.warnStyle.description: Enables warnings for style guideline mismatches

zig.zls.highlightGlobalVarDeclarations.description: Whether to highlight global var declarations

zig.zls.dangerousComptimeExperimentsDoNo.description: Whether to use the comptime interpreter

zig.zls.skipStdReferences.description: When true, skips searching for references in std. Improves lookup speed for functions in user's code. Renaming and go-to-definition will continue to work as is

zig.zls.preferAstCheckAsChildProcess.description: Can be used in conjuction with `enable_ast_check_diagnostics` to favor using `zig ast-check` instead of ZLS's fork

zig.zls.recordSession.description: When true, zls will record all request is receives and write in into `record_session_path`, so that they can replayed with `zls replay`

zig.zls.recordSessionPath.description: Output file path when `record_session` is set. The recommended file extension *.zlsreplay

zig.zls.replaySessionPath.description: Used when calling `zls replay` for specifying the replay file. If no extra argument is given `record_session_path` is used as the default path.

zig.zls.builtinPath.description: Path to 'builtin;' useful for debugging, automatically set if let null

zig.zls.zigLibPath.description: Zig library path, e.g. `/path/to/zig/lib/zig`, used to analyze std library imports

zig.zls.buildRunnerPath.description: Path to the `build_runner.zig` file provided by zls. null is equivalent to `${executable_directory}/build_runner.zig`

zig.zls.globalCachePath.description: Path to a directory that will be used as zig's cache. null is equivalent to `${KnownFolders.Cache}/zls`

zig.zls.buildRunnerGlobalCachePath.description: Path to a directory that will be used as the global cache path when executing a projects build.zig. null is equivalent to the path shown by `zig env`

zig.zls.completionsWithReplace.description: Completions confirm behavior. If 'true', replace the text after the cursor

commands.title: Build Workspace
commands.description: Build the current project using 'zig build'
